```{r Aggregation}
agg_NY <- aggregate(NY[,c("npr", "mgrent", "hhinc", "X_24a")], by = list(NY$year, NY$sba), FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)
colnames(agg_NY) <- c("Year", "Sub_Borough","Avg_NPR", "Avg_Rent", "Avg_Income", "Avg_Rooms")
agg_NY$Rent_Inc <- agg_NY$Avg_Rent/agg_NY$Avg_Income
agg_NY$People_Room <- agg_NY$Avg_NPR/agg_NY$Avg_Rooms
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = subset(agg_NY, agg_NY$Sub_Borough %in% c("301")), aes(x = Year, y = Avg_Income), group = 1) +
  geom_point()
```
